d2mDatos

Class DatosLinea

  • java.lang.Object
    • d2mDatos.datos
      • d2mDatos.DatosLinea

  • public class DatosLinea
extends datos
    This class defines the structure of DatosLinea DatosLinea is a data structure that stores the parameters needed to generate a line.
